name: Workout Rookie
description: Awarded for completing your first workout session.

name: Workout Enthusiast
description: Earned by logging workouts consistently for a week.

name: Workout Pro
description: Recognizes advanced performance and regular training.

name: Workout Legend
description: For those who have reached extraordinary fitness levels.

name: Cardio Crusher
description: For smashing through cardio goals and setting a strong pace.
requirement: Achieve 100 minutes of cardio in one session.

name: Strength Starter
description: Beginners who have started their strength training journey.
requirement: Complete your first strength training session.

name: Endurance Expert
description: For demonstrating superior stamina and perseverance.

name: Flexibility Fanatic
description: Honors those who consistently practice stretching and mobility.

name: HIIT Hero
description: For excelling in high intensity interval training routines.
requirement: Complete 5 HIIT sessions in one week.

name: Calisthenics Champ
description: Awarded for mastering bodyweight exercises and routines.

name: Fitness Freak
description: For those who live and breathe fitness daily.
requirement: Log workouts every day for 30 consecutive days.

name: Gym Grinder
description: Recognizes your commitment to training hard at the gym.

name: Workout Warrior
description: For overcoming challenges and pushing through limits.
requirement: Achieve a personal best in 3 different workouts.

name: Nutrition Novice
description: Beginners are recognized for starting a healthy eating journey.

name: Healthy Eater
description: For consistently choosing nutritious food options.

name: Balanced Dieter
description: Awarded for maintaining a well-balanced diet over time.
requirement: Maintain a balanced diet for 14 days.

name: Meal Prep Master
description: For those who plan and prepare their meals in advance.

name: Vitamin Voyager
description: Recognizes dedication to incorporating essential vitamins into meals.
requirement: Include a variety of fruits and vegetables for 7 days.

name: Smoothie Specialist
description: For creating and enjoying nutrient-packed smoothies.

name: Clean Eating Champion
description: Awarded for a commitment to a clean and natural diet.
requirement: Follow a clean eating plan for 21 days.

name: Diet Detective
description: For tracking and analyzing your eating habits.
requirement: Keep a detailed food diary for 7 days.

name: Foodie Fanatic
description: Recognizes a passion for exploring healthy recipes.
requirement: Try and review 5 new healthy recipes.

name: Calorie Counter
description: For effectively tracking daily calorie intake.

name: Superfood Seeker
description: Awarded for incorporating superfoods into your diet.
requirement: Eat at least 3 different superfoods every week for a month.

name: Nutrition Guru
description: For achieving expert-level knowledge in healthy eating.
requirement: Attend a nutrition seminar or complete an online course.

name: Social Starter
description: For engaging with the community for the first time.
requirement: Post your first comment or share.

name: Community Connector
description: Earned by connecting with other members in the community.

name: Buddy Builder
description: For building strong bonds with fellow fitness enthusiasts.

name: Friendship Facilitator
description: Recognizes efforts to foster supportive social interactions.
requirement: Host or organize a community workout.

name: Supportive Socializer
description: Awarded for regularly supporting and encouraging others.

name: Team Player
description: For actively participating in team challenges and events.

name: Challenge Chatter
description: Earned by engaging in discussions around challenges.
requirement: Start or contribute to 10 challenge threads.

name: Motivation Maven
description: For inspiring others with your motivational posts.

name: Social Butterfly
description: Recognizes an active presence across community platforms.

name: Engagement Expert
description: For achieving high engagement on your posts and comments.
requirement: Receive 100 likes or comments on posts.

name: Collaboration Connoisseur
description: Awarded for successful collaboration with community members.

name: Community Champion
description: For outstanding contributions and leadership within the community.
requirement: Lead a community event or challenge.

name: Milestone Achiever
description: Awarded for reaching your first major fitness milestone.

name: Goal Getter
description: Recognizes consistent progress toward set goals.

name: Progress Pioneer
description: For trailblazing progress and breaking personal records.
requirement: Beat your personal best in 3 different activities.

name: Success Seeker
description: Awarded for persistent effort towards achieving success.

name: Challenge Conqueror
description: For overcoming a series of difficult challenges.

name: Persistent Performer
description: Recognizes relentless commitment and consistency.

name: Dedication Dynamo
description: For demonstrating extraordinary dedication to your goals.
requirement: Achieve a long-term goal after 6 months of effort.

name: Ambition Architect
description: Awarded for setting ambitious goals and working towards them.
requirement: Outline and begin work on 3 major goals.

name: Victory Voyager
description: For traveling the path to victory in your fitness journey.
requirement: Achieve a significant victory in a challenge.

name: Triumph Tracker
description: Recognizes every win and significant accomplishment.
requirement: Log 10 triumphs in your fitness journey.

name: Milestone Master
description: Awarded for consistently reaching and surpassing milestones.

name: Achievement Ace
description: For collecting a wide range of achievements along your journey.

name: Goal Guardian
description: Recognizes your ability to protect and achieve your goals.
requirement: Maintain your goal streak for 45 days.
